name: Dungeoneer (itch) (Schilde)
description:
Controls:

Move with mouse.

Shoot: Left-click

Dash: Right-click

Best enjoyed in fullscreen.

Dungeoneer is a top-down shooter, where you, playing as a knife, have to defeat every last opponent and beat your highscore. 

Can you reach 10.000? 

Weekly game jam: 18.10 - 25.10
